title: I need some answers to the pbe thing..
body: My account is ready to join the pbe, but will my current account change so I can't play with my friends and only other account in pbe? :)

replies.body: So i cant play with my friends and i cant go back if i dont like it?
Your PBE account is completely separate from your live account, and a completely different client.  Make sure to download the PBE client in order to access that region.
